Articles.Content: I thought I had seen a youtube preview of the DLC where it was possible to select launch sites from a dropdown to the button in the VAB, this is not available in any of my existing saves. Do I have to start a new save or does TTI need to release a new patch with this feature enabled. =|
It is available in Missions, in Sandbox mode, and in Career mode once you have upgraded the building to Tier 2, IIRC.
Think its turned off by default in pre-MH saves. Needs to be turned on in the Difficulty settings.
